title: Fact Check: Viral audio clip about India going under complete lockdown due to corona scare is misleading
description: An audio clip in the voice of a panicky girl, speaking in English, is being shared on WhatsApp groups in which she claims a complete lockdown will be enforced within the next five days. But, what is the truth?
content:
Has the Indian government planned a China-like stringent lockdown to curb the menace of coronavirus, forcing people to stay indoors till at least April 15?
